StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [spSetShowNoShow]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as begin /*==================================================================== purpose: This procedure will be scheduled to execute once a day to update the Meps_Schedule.Processing_Status to Show or Now Show. This is a temporay solu.on. MEPCOM will provide a Processing status of show/no show with their next schedule relase of MIRS to take place Dec 2000. Once the MIRS Import interface is adjusted to take into account the changes this procedure will be deac.vated.
Author: Gregory Gonzalez, BAH
Oct 27, 2000 GG Ini.al Crea.on Jun 12, 2001 RM Added the update to User_Login and Update_Date columns =====================================================================*/ update meps_schedule set processing_status = 'S', update_date = getdate(), user_login = 'ShowJob' from nwa n le. outer join candidate_asvab ca on n.marine_candidate_id = ca.marine_candidate_id and asvab_date = (select max(asvab_date) from candidate_asvab where marine_candidate_id = n.marine_candidate_id and asvab_date < getDate()), nwa n2 le. outer join candidate_special_exam cse on n2.marine_candidate_id = cse.marine_candidate_id and special_exam_date = (select max(special_exam_date) from candidate_special_exam where marine_candidate_id = n2.marine_candidate_id and special_exam_date < getDate()), nwa n3 le. outer join candidate_medical_exam cme on n3.marine_candidate_id = cme.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'FULL' and medical_exam_date = (select max(medical_exam_date) from candidate_medical_exam where marine_candidate_id = n3.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'FULL' and medical_exam_date < getDate()), nwa n4 le. outer join candidate_medical_exam cme2 on n4.marine_candidate_id = cme2.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'INSP' and medical_exam_date = (select max(medical_exam_date) from candidate_medical_exam where marine_candidate_id = n4.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'INSP' and medical_exam_date < getDate()), nwa n5 le. outer join candidate_medical_exam cme3 on n5.marine_candidate_id = cme3.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'CONS' and medical_exam_date = (select max(medical_exam_date) from candidate_medical_exam where marine_candidate_id = n5.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'CONS' and medical_exam_date < getDate())
where meps_schedule.processing_status = 'M' and meps_schedule.processing_date < getDate() and meps_schedule.nwa_id = n.nwa_id and n.nwa_id = n2.nwa_id and n2.nwa_id = n3.nwa_id and n3.nwa_id = n4.nwa_id and n4.nwa_id = n5.nwa_id and ((ca.asvab_date = meps_schedule.processing_date and asvab = 'Y')or (cse.special_exam_date = meps_schedule.processing_date and special_exam = 'Y')or (cme.medical_exam_date = meps_schedule.processing_date and complete_physical = 'Y')or (cme2.medical_exam_date = meps_schedule.processing_date and inspec.on_physical = 'Y')or (cme3.medical_exam_date = meps_schedule.processing_date and consulta.on_physical = 'Y'))
update meps_schedule set processing_status = 'N', update_date = getdate(), user_login = 'ShowJob' from nwa n le. outer join candidate_asvab ca on n.marine_candidate_id = ca.marine_candidate_id and asvab_date = (select max(asvab_date) from candidate_asvab where marine_candidate_id = n.marine_candidate_id and asvab_date < getDate()), nwa n2 le. outer join candidate_special_exam cse on n2.marine_candidate_id = cse.marine_candidate_id and special_exam_date = (select max(special_exam_date) from candidate_special_exam where marine_candidate_id = n2.marine_candidate_id and special_exam_date < getDate()), nwa n3 le. outer join candidate_medical_exam cme on n3.marine_candidate_id = cme.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'FULL' and medical_exam_date = (select max(medical_exam_date) from candidate_medical_exam where marine_candidate_id = n3.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'FULL' and medical_exam_date < getDate()), nwa n4 le. outer join candidate_medical_exam cme2 on n4.marine_candidate_id = cme2.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'INSP' and medical_exam_date = (select max(medical_exam_date) from candidate_medical_exam where marine_candidate_id = n4.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'INSP' and medical_exam_date < getDate()), nwa n5 le. outer join candidate_medical_exam cme3 on n5.marine_candidate_id = cme3.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'CONS' and medical_exam_date = (select max(medical_exam_date) from candidate_medical_exam where marine_candidate_id = n5.marine_candidate_id and medical_exam_type = 'CONS' and medical_exam_date < getDate()) where processing_status = 'M' and processing_date < getDate() and meps_schedule.nwa_id = n.nwa_id and n.nwa_id = n2.nwa_id and n2.nwa_id = n3.nwa_id and n3.nwa_id = n4.nwa_id and n4.nwa_id = n5.nwa_id and (not(ca.asvab_date = processing_date and asvab = 'Y') or ca.asvab_date is null) and (not(cse.special_exam_date = processing_date and special_exam = 'Y') or cse.special_exam_date is null) and (not(cme.medical_exam_date = processing_date and complete_physical = 'Y') or cme.medical_exam_date is null) and (not(cme2.medical_exam_date = processing_date and inspec.on_physical = 'Y') or cme2.medical_exam_date is null) and (not(cme3.medical_exam_date = processing_date and consulta.on_physical = 'Y') or cme3.medical_exam_date is null)
end
